entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , St. Leonard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23 except minus 30 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 23 except minus 30 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. High minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
